column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The hostess and servers were all very pleasant. We were seated near the back at a half table/half booth. I'm not sure if it is only on Father's Day or for every brunch
column2: but when we went only the brunch menu was being served. Not an issue though because it had a good variety of options. I started with the breakfast in bed shot (maple whiskey
column4: shot of orange juice) and peach sangria and ordered the sticky bun burger for my meal. My friend went with a classic mimosa
